name: OneStepMaze
description:
In this game you're a little robot: J.E.F.F, Your task is to progress through a maze in space. What is the catch you may ask?   The floor, After you take a step off a block the floor will fall into space.Try to make your way to the end.  Wait why is there gravity in spa- SHUT UP LUKE!

You controll J.E.F.F. with "wasd" thats it !
